TopicTitle: SXSW 2014 Unofficial Kerbal Space Program Meet Up !

Articles.Content:
Hi

I am eagerly awaiting the Kerbal / NASA discussion at SXSW on Saturday March 8th.

Is anyone interested in meeting up during SXSW and regaling stories of past failed missions to the Mun? Perhaps tipping a 40oz in honor of the brave Kerbalnauts who went beyond the point of no return and transmitted data so you could get a few extra science points?

I live downtown and can arrange a place for maybe 15-20 peeps, either at a good local restaurant or drinks at my Austin Kerbal Research Center (one car garage).

I think maybe a pre-burn (retrograde style) around 6pm or 7pm on Saturday night.

Send me a message and I will get a list and Facebook invite together.

[email protected]

Joe C

If only I had the money... XD

Welcome aboard anyway, if you're new to the forums!

If only I had the money... XD

Welcome aboard anyway, if you're new to the forums!

thanks...im very new to the program. its awesome.

hopefully i can get a few kerbalnauts together, it is the perfect venue.
